name: FSF Corporate Ship Blueprints
desc: A package of FSF starships blueprintscommonly found in most heavy industry outputs

name: FSF Internal Ship Blueprints
desc: A collection of FSF-designed starships and weapons that can be replicated in with heavy industry

name: S-1 Cruise Missile
desc: The S-1 Cruise Missile is a special missile that uses the hull of a frigate for long range flight. Its armour-piercing payload is based on creating hot plasma jets using a conventional warhead to melt a series of specially embedded shrapnel. After launch, it will automatically search for the nearest hostile fleet up to 60 degrees ahead.
